VideoCloudReEncodeFromExistingSourceAdapter - Class in com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.actors
Takes each Record provided by downstream providers and uses it to issue a command to re-encode that video from existing source.
VideoCloudReEncodeFromExistingSourceAdapter(Workflow) - Constructor for class com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.actors.VideoCloudReEncodeFromExistingSourceAdapter
Default constructor - workflow this actor is part of must be provided
VideoCloudVideoTouchAdapter - Class in com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.actors
Takes each Record provided by downstream providers and uses it to "touch" a video in a Video Cloud account.

Default constructor - workflow this actor is part of must be provided
